name: FastMall
tag_list: shopping-mall, mall, shopping, fast, iphone, app, interactive, navigation, google-maps, gps, locate, navigate, fun, community, family, friends, deals
overview:
Apple iPhone app, Android Market app FastMall is 100% FREE for all shopping mall maps + 50 other new features.

FastMall is the first and only iPhone app that lets you shake your iPhone to find, then be taken to the nearest bathroom. It also provides turn-by-turn directions for finding your way inside shopping malls and around shopping districts in the USA, Canada UK and 31 countries at present.

Have a stroller? In a wheelchair? Trouble with stairs? FastMall provides directions using only elevators when needed.

1 â€“ Registration is now completely optional. If you want to be a part of the community, you can register with FastMall, login with your Facebook account.

2 â€“ FastMall now opens up very quickly to enjoy the experience immediately.

3 â€“ App now available in Spanish!

4 â€“ Shortcuts! You can now simply swipe your finger across any mall listing (blue menu) to show you easy shortcuts for mall info, restroom locations, restaurant information, remember where you parked, get deals and more.

5 â€“ My malls section has been added. This section is to see all of your favorite malls in 1 place. Simply tap the add to â€œmy mallsâ€ text link on the main menu for any mall and it automatically saves it to that section.

6 â€“ Profile added. You can now select the photo of your choice and set it as your avatar.

7 â€“ Add a VIDEO or photos to your review of any product, store, restroom, restaurant or anything else shopping related. We will post it in the app and on the website/youtube channel after moderation.

8 â€“ Community features upgraded. You now have the ability to add/view reviews with videos or photos. Share on Facebook and Twitter as well or email any review to someone.

9 â€“ Map icon filter added. This feature is located on the bottom right of any mall map. You can tap this icon to choose the icons you want to view on the map. For example you can removemall entrance icons, elevator icons and so on if you like.

10 â€“ Select mode on all mall maps. This is one coolest new features that enable you to navigate around the map with your finger! On any map simply tap, then hold down your finger and drag your finger over the stores. You can see the store names on the map! Then release your finger from over the map and a pin drops onto the selected store!

11 â€“ Check in at any mall or store! Similar to Foursquare or Gowalla, FastMall now allows you to check in and let the world know where you are! To check in you can simply go to any blue mall menu and tap check in, or on the store detail/mall information page, tap check in and your all set! A future version coming soon we will give you badges and rewards for checking in, look for prizes and lots of other fun to come.

12 â€“ Add mall or store to the main menu of the app! Choose any mall or store that you like and add that icon to the main menu as a shortcut!

13 â€“ You can then move any icon to the location on the main app screen by dragging them around. Similar to how you can move icons around on your iPhone, press and hold over any menu icon. You will see the icon â€œshakeâ€ and then you can slide them around to page 2 or 3 or wherever you want! Tap the red DONE button once finished and your ready to go.

14 â€“ View the latest check-ins by users in the community section.

15 â€“ Review anything you would like.

Check http://www.FastMall.com/blog for more updated information. We have over 1275 malls interactive all over the world.

If you would like to add an interactive map including turn by turn navigation for any place anywhere in the world, just let us know. Check out our latest venture for navigation without GPS or WIFI - http://www.MapEverywhere.com

iTunes link for Apple iPhone app:

http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/fastmall/id340656157?mt=8

Search Android Market for FastMall

milestones.description: FastMall iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch app is now in 12 countries around the world and has over 500 interactive mall directory maps.
milestones.source_description: Apple iPhone app FastMall is now 100% FREE and in 12 countries around the world.
